meanings.sent1: Watching funny videos on the internet amuses me.
meanings.sent2: The clown's performance amuses the children at the party.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy amuses everyone with its antics.
meanings.sent4: Her witty jokes always amuse the audience.
meanings.sent5: The colorful magic show truly amuses the young audience.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to laugh or smile
meanings.sent1: The comedian's jokes always amuse the audience.
meanings.sent2: The funny movie scene amuses everyone in the theater.
meanings.sent3: The silly dance moves never fail to amuse her friends.
meanings.sent4: His humorous stories amuse people for hours.
meanings.sent5: The clever cartoon characters never fail to amuse the kids.
